import React from 'react';
import { Image, Text, TouchableOpacity, View } from 'react-native';
import { heightPercentageToDP as hp, widthPercentageToDP as wp } from 'react-native-responsive-screen';
import FeatherIcon from 'react-native-vector-icons/Feather';
import { mowColors } from '../../values/Colors/MowColors';
import { borderStyle } from '../../values/Styles/MowStyles';

export const OrderItem = ({ navigation, value, key, onClick }): React.ReactElement => {
    return (
        <TouchableOpacity
            onPress={onClick}
            style={{
                marginHorizontal: wp('5%'),
                marginVertical: hp('1%'),
                backgroundColor: mowColors.categoryBGColor,
                flexDirection: 'row',
                padding: 10,
                ...borderStyle,
                borderWidth: 1.5,
            }}
            key={key}>
            <View
                style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }}>
                <Image
                    source={{ uri: value.orderDetails[0].product.featuredImage }}
                    resizeMode={'contain'}
                    style={{ height: hp('8%'), width: hp('8%'), borderRadius: 10 }} />
                <View
                    style={{
                        position: 'absolute',
                        backgroundColor: 'grey',
                        right: wp(-4),
                        borderRadius: 100,
                        width: hp(3.5),
                        height: hp(3.5),
                        alignItems: 'center',
                        justifyContent: 'center',
                    }}>
                    <Text
                        style={{ fontSize: hp(1.6), color: 'white', fontWeight: '500' }}>
                        {value.orderDetails.length}
                    </Text>
                </View>
            </View>

            <View
                style={{ marginLeft: wp(7), flex: 2 }}>
                <Text
                    style={{
                        fontSize: hp('1.7%'),
                        fontWeight: 'normal',
                        fontStyle: 'normal',
                        letterSpacing: 0,
                        textAlign: 'left',
                        color: mowColors.textColor,
                    }}>
                    {value.createdAt.split('T')[0]}
                </Text>
                <Text
                    style={{
                        fontSize: hp('1.7%'),
                        fontWeight: 'normal',
                        fontStyle: 'normal',
                        letterSpacing: 0,
                        textAlign: 'left',
                        color: mowColors.titleTextColor,
                    }}>
                    {value.orderCode}
                </Text>
                <View
                    style={{ flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'flex-start', marginTop: 3 }}>
                    <Text
                        style={{
                            marginLeft: 5,
                            fontSize: hp('1.4%'),
                            fontWeight: 'bold',
                            fontStyle: 'normal',
                            letterSpacing: 0,
                            textAlign: 'left',
                            color: mowColors.titleTextColor,
                        }}>
                        {value.orderStatus}
                    </Text>
                </View>
            </View>
            <View
                style={{ flex: 2, flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }}>
                <Text
                    style={{
                        fontSize: hp('1.5%'),
                        fontWeight: 'bold',
                        fontStyle: 'normal',
                        letterSpacing: 0,
                        textAlign: 'left',
                        color: '#48bb20',
                    }}>
                    {value.orderPaymentDetails.total} BDT
                </Text>
                <View
                    style={{
                        backgroundColor: '#b6babe',
                        width: hp('4%'),
                        height: hp('4%'),
                        justifyContent: 'center',
                        alignItems: 'center',
                        borderRadius: 100,
                        marginLeft: 20,
                    }}>
                    <FeatherIcon
                        style={{ fontSize: hp('2%'), color: 'white' }}
                        name={'arrow-right'} />
                </View>
            </View>
        </TouchableOpacity>
    );
}
